transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello, a very good afternoon sir. Meri taraf se Gitali Herbal mein ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Sir, main Kavita baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aapke account manager. Sir, maine jo call kiya wo service ke regarding jo hai call kiya hai. Jaise ki abhi main check kar rahi thi sir, two months hue hai aapko services use kiye hue sir. But aap jo buyleads consume kyu nahi kar rahe hai? Kya tension aa raha hai aapka?
Customer: Madam, aap dusre number pe phone kar lijiye.
Executive: Sir, aap please koi number provide kar dijiye then main connect kar leti hu.
Customer: Main sir aapko dunga.

The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Customer: Aage baat karna cha raha hu, mere ko leads nahi aa rahi, main kya karu?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold pe rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello madam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir, aap mere ko number provide kar dijiye.
Customer: Madam, note kar lijiye aap number.
Customer: Ji aa rahi hai, aap note kar lijiye number.
Executive: Ji bataiye.
Customer: 98
Executive: 98
Customer: 37
Executive: 37
Customer: 06
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: 06
Executive: 06
Customer: 26
Executive: 26
Customer: 90
Executive: 90. Main repeat kar deti hu 9837062690. Yahi number hai ji?
Customer: Yes madam, yahi hai.
Executive: IndiaMART ki jo profile hai wo yahi dekhte hai, right sir?
Customer: Ji ji sir. Ji madam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes madam, yahi dekhte hai.
Executive: Ji sir, wo to thik hai matlab aap aap kaun hai matlab aap aap bhi dekhte hai IndiaMART ki profile? Kyuki aapka number bhi.
Customer: Madam, dekh rahe hai hum, dekh rahe hai hum.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Main unka beta hu madam.
Executive: Okay, aap unke bete hai. To sir matlab jo sir hai wahi dekhte hai IndiaMART, aap nahi dekhte?
Customer: Yes madam, wo dekhte hai jyadatar.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir, kyuki main maine na shayad maine jo hai is number pe connect kiya hua hai 98 but unhone maine kaha ki aap jo hai Gitali Herbal se baat kare unhone mana kar diya ki nahi Gitali Herbal se baat nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi abhi baat to.
Executive: Ji sir, ek bar number main repeat kar deti hu ek bar check kijiyega na. 9837062690. Yahi number hai, right?
Customer: Yahi hai.
Executive: Ji. Accha sir, waise jaise aapne bataya ki aap bhi dekhte hai. To sir abhi buyleads wagera consume kyu nahi kar rahe hai? Reason jaan sakte hai main?
Customer: Kya karu sir abhi na.
Customer: [unintelligible] matlab wo attend nahi karta wo abhi.
Executive: Accha matlab aap bilkul nahi dekhte, wahi dekhte hai jo aapke father hai?
Customer: Yes madam, yes madam.
Executive: Okay. To sir ek bar fir main kuch time baad unse maybe shayad wo busy honge, kuch time baad main unse connect kar leti hu. Ji?
Customer: Yes madam, ek ghante baad kar lena aap.
Executive: Ji, okay sir.
Customer: Okay madam, okay madam.
Executive: Okay sir, have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not consuming buyleads.

- Customer wants leads.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for alternate number.

- Executive confirmed the number and profile details.

- Executive will connect later with the father.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after one hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, alternate number
